Entry.Name: Insecure Socket Factory
Entry.Description: This application employs instances of socket factories with all SSL security checks disabled, utilizing an optional handshake timeout and SSL session cache. Such configurations render the sockets susceptible to Man-in-the-Middle (MitM) attacks.

Mitigation.Textual:
Please remove all the insecure code that use method getInsecure, and prefer using Default SSL Socket Factory.
Further informations here.
